name: Renegade Grounds: Episode 2
description:
In the last episode, Agela and Ingus found themselves going from one bad situation to another till eventually getting captured. But their time is not up yet. They now have to clear their names and uncover council’s secret plan, a plan that is being led by General Danyll. The stakes could not be higher. A new ally joins in with Agela and Ingus – a teenage lizardman called Rhask. Along with their existing allies, they have a hefty task ahead of them and endless amount of danger around every corner. Aside from being outnumbered by Danyll’s soldiers, they must also continue facing the fanatical Kiverhim Cult and have run-ins with the persistent demon prince Ogoz the 3rd.

Features:
• Continuation of the story from the first episode.
• Dialogue is fully voice acted.
• Simple turn-based combat with a rows system – being in the back row offers extra protection from enemy melee attacks but makes own attacks weaker, whereas being at the front allows for stronger attacks but also makes the character more vulnerable to an enemy onslaught.
• Equipment upgrading system returns! Use certain items as upgrades to your weapons and armour to give them additional stat bonuses.
• Two difficulty modes: Normal and Brazen.
• The battle arena is back! This time with 3 different modes, each one with its own set of rules: Standard, Infallible, and Marathon.
